data.name: VoidExpanse: Soundtrack Complete
data.detailed_description:
Original Soundtrack for VoidExpanse and VoidExpanse: Pariahs' Bane composed by Konstantin Glazunov.

Features

  • All 32 soundtracks from the game, including unreleased (legacy) soundtrack.
  • Available in MP3, OGG and FLAC (lossless) format.
  • Total playtime 1h40 (100 minutes).
  • Includes composer notes on creation of this soundtrack.

Full track list

Combat themes:
  • 1. Space Paladins (1:57) - combat_001
  • 2. Battle in Dust Clouds (1:49) - combat_002
  • 3. Quick Sort of Death (1:59) - combat_003
  • 4. Enemy Detected (2:08) - combat_004
  • 5. High Energy Particles (2:06) - combat_005
  • 6. Target Acquired (2:12) - combat_006
  • 7. Maneuver or Die! (2:50) - combat_007
  • 8. Final Fury (3:46) - combat_008
  • 9. Sparkling Fighter Bird (1:50) - combat_009

Exploration themes:
  • 10. Clouds of Dust (3:59) - gameplay_001
  • 11. Exploring in Close Orbit (3:02) - gameplay_002
  • 12. Gates of Xengatarn (3:18) - gameplay_003
  • 13. Trash Inspection (3:14) - gameplay_004
  • 14. Universe of Fading Suns (2:36) - gameplay_005
  • 15. Distant Starlight (3:18) - gameplay_006
  • 16. Lost Cluster (3:22) - gameplay_007
  • 17. World in Shining (3:06) - gameplay_008
  • 18. Unexplored Frontiers (4:15) - gameplay_009
  • 19. Passing Dangerous Sector (3:14) - gameplay_010
  • 20. Gravitation (4:34) - gameplay_011
  • 21. Navigator (2:59) - gameplay_012
  • 22. Hidden Evil (3:08) - gameplay_013
  • 23. Space Stranger (2:31) - gameplay_014

Station themes:
  • 24. Mechanical Realm (3:40) - station_001
  • 25. Stone-crusher (3:53) - station_002
  • 26. Tree of Eternal Evolution (3:22) - station_003
  • 27. The Last Stand (4:00) - station_004
  • 28. Where All Roads Meet (3:38) - station_005
  • 29. Shelter of Pariahs (3:02) - station_006

Other themes:
  • 30. VoidExpanse - Main Theme (legacy version) (3:49) - theme_001
  • 31. Fly By - Main Theme (4:02) - theme_002
  • 32. My Justice - Ending Theme (3:56) - theme_003

Total duration: 1:40:35

data.short_description: Original Soundtrack for VoidExpanse and VoidExpanse: Pariahs' Bane composed by Konstantin Glazunov. All 46 soundtracks from the game, including unreleased (legacy) soundtrack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core or AMD eqv.
  • Storage: 1600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Needed
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core or AMD eqv.
  • Storage: 1600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Needed

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: Intel Core or AMD eqv.
  • Storage: 1600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Needed
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: Intel Core or AMD eqv.
  • Storage: 1600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Needed

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu and Fedora 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core or AMD eqv.
  • Storage: 1600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Needed
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu and Fedora 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core or AMD eqv.
  • Storage: 1600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Needed
